name: Senior C# Developer

address.raw: округ Белград, Старый Город, улица Царицы Милицы, 3

description:
Please pay attention that the vacancy requires relocation to Serbia after passing the probation period!

Cloud Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) company Acumatica is looking for a Senior C# Developer - Application Engineer, who loves the challenge of building complex business applications, and who is committed to deliver the best quality cloud ERP product to the global market.

Why working with us

  • International software company that develops a cloud ERP product for the global market
  • Competitive salary and bonus
  • Remote work and flexible work hours
  • Professional growth unlimited Coursera access
  • English courses with a teacher and a native speaker
  • Access to the meditation app Calm
  • Great voluntary health insurance including dental care for you and your family

What you will be doing

In close collaboration with business analysts and QA engineers, you will:

  • Continuously learn the knowledge domain and grow expertise in Acumatica ERP cloud platform
  • Develop new functionality based on Acumatica cloud platform and maintain the existing functionality
  • Develop unit tests and contribute to quality assurance
  • Actively participate in software requirements elicitation and product improvement

What is expected from you

  • Significant experience in development of business applications on C#.NET and SQL
  • Understanding of architectural patterns, OOP, data structures and algorithms
  • Ability to understand and work with existing code
  • Familiarity with a distributed source control system (Git, Mercurial, etc.)
  • BSc (Bachelor’s Degree) or MSc (Master of Science) in computer science, programming, information technology and systems, or similar
  • Intermediate level of English (reading, writing)

Will be a plus

  • ERP or CRM system development experience at a vendor company

  • Work experience with ORM frameworks (e.g. Entity Framework, Dapper, NHibernate)

Technology stack

  • Comprehensive proprietary SDK based on C#.NET Framework
  • A lot of Microsoft SQL Server and bit of MySQL

About us

There is only one true Cloud ERP platform designed for mid-sized customers – Acumatica. Acumatica is a leading innovator in cloud ERP with customers located around the world. Acumatica provides the full suite of integrated business management applications, including Financials, Distribution, Manufacturing, Project Accounting, Field Service, Commerce Edition, Construction Edition, and CRM.

Acumatica has offices located throughout North America, Europe, and Asia. Acumatica HQ is located in Bellevue, USA.

But don’t take our word for it — read what analysts like Gartner and Nucleus Research have to say about us.
